quote: No spring nor summer hath such grace as I have seen in one autumnal face.
author: John Donne

quote: The secret of life, though, is to fall seven times and to get up eight times.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: One cannot think well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: A mask tells us more than a face.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: One cannot think well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only one page.
author: St. Augustine
authorCaption: North African Christian theologian and philosopher

quote: There is nothing better than a friend, unless it is a friend with chocolate.
author: Linda Grayson

quote: Cultivation of mind should be the ultimate aim of human existence.
author: B. R. Ambedkar
authorCaption: Indian jurist, economist, social reformer and political leader

quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
author: Marie Curie

quote: To be secure on land, we must be supreme at sea.
author: Jawaharlal Nehru
authorCaption: Indian independence activist, later the first Prime Minister of India
